kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://apiqanbccproject.herokuapp.com/api/hotpeppers/ path_url=/api/hotpeppers/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '410', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"brandName": "Stephen Roth", "sauceName": "Original", "description": "Cholula Original Hot Sauce is created from a generations old recipe that features carefully-selectedarbol and piquin peppers and a blend of signature spices. We love it on burgers and chicken but have heard it\\u2019s amazing on pizza. Uncap Real Flavor with Cholula Original.", "url": "https://www.cholula.com/original.html", "heat": 3600}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
